post.body: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!!!!! Glad your kitty is back!!!
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boxing_Day
you need to barrow my kitties! Great mousers! ;-P
I went and checked my mail... Thank you Melody! I love the card!!! It went into my curio cabinet! :D
Gee...who wouldn't want one from Melody? :-P
sometimes shopping stinks!
All went well... they had laughing gas... *giggles*
WooHoo!
waking up is hard to do... lol
you are not alone on that one! lol :-P
oh trust me,... I know! lol
Is this roll call? I'm here! lol
just passing through... khat7, I hope your cat shows up soon!
Merry Christmas everyone!!!
Having cats is Constant entertainment!!! haha
I wish that instead of nasty cold weather that we'd get snow to go with it. So tired of it just getting cold and nothing else.
I am waiting for the husband to get paid so that I can begin the running around crap that I love soooo much...
getting ready to goto the dentist... *whimpers* Going to get a tooth pulled. :(
warming up the car.... its 13 degrees F out there! -1 wind chill...
trying to get a cranky baby to goto sleep...
